column1: Kata Robata////I understand that many people come here for the sushi. They rave that this is one of the best sushi locations. This may be true
column2: if compared only to Houston area locations. I've had sushi here multiple times
column3: but I could tell that the fish were not so fresh; it was beginning to dry out and the flavors were fading. As salmon roe is one of my favorites
column4: I have ordered it multiple times. In all instances
column6: one visit was detrimental. The salmon roe was fishy beyond belief
column7: as if it had been soaking in a fish tank. I could tell that the salmon roe had spoiled. Therefore
column8: when coming to Kata Robata I no longer eat sushi as their quality of seafood is questionable at best.
